articles.title: European Space Agency releases photo of Earth split in day and night - WION
articles.description: European Space Agency releases photo of Earth split in day and night
articles.content:
A satellite picture was released by the European Space Agency (ESA) of the surface of Earth split in day and night as one half appeared in the dark and the other experienced day.
